answers.answer: No, the things you are experiencing are very unlikely to be from the medications. As you say, you seem to have hormone issues. I would speak to your gynocologist. Also, not to be indelicate, but there are ways to deal with sexual urges without being sexually active.
Good site for all things diabetes.

question: I have hot flashes and and bad hormone issues .  The sexual urges are bad at least once per week.I am not sexually active.Are the problems the result of any of the following medications that i am taking for diabetesLantus 25 units  nightlyMetformin 250 units taken twice per dayAlso taking medication fgor hypertension and chloseterol
title: diabetes
